page.title: 03A SCHOOL YEAR IN BENTHAM
page.content: This is an account of my school year and what I do. January and February are quiet months at school. In March the teachers interview our parents about our work. April is the month for the Easter holidays. During May it is Open Night when our parents come to see our work. In June, on Tuesdays, we go swimming to Ingleton pool. Two major things happen in July, there is Sports Day and we visit Ingleton Middle School. In September we go to our new classes and during October we have our photographs taken and have a Harvest Festival. We rehearse for our Christmas concert in November and December. Late in the term there are Christmas parties and a dinner.
